translation: Having obtained excuses from the service of the 1st Line, as the following soldiers of the 2nd Cavalry Corps José Coutinho de Almeida, Jeremias José Pinho, Antônio Soares de Oliveira, Francisco de Quevedo, Francisco Rodrigues de Morais, João Antônio Granada, Daniel José de Araújo, and José Bernardino de Oliveira have completed their engagement time; and since all will reside in this department, please serve Your Excellency, Sir.
